class.name: FileSystemDock
class.brief_description: An editor-only dock to view and manage files on the local filesystem.
class.description: Used by the editor to view and manage files on the local filesystem. Only files contained within the project(relative to the project).

method.name: navigate_to_path
method.description: Navigates to the path specified in [code]arg0[/code].

signal.name: display_mode_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the display mode is changed between the list view and tree view.

signal.name: file_removed
signal.description: Emitted when a file was successfully removed.

signal.name: files_moved
signal.description: Emitted when a file was successfully moved. This signal is emitted once for each file moved.

signal.name: folder_moved
signal.description: Emitted when a folder was successfully moved. This signal is emitted once for each folder moved.

signal.name: folder_removed
signal.description: Emitted when a folder was successfully removed.
